frontmatter.title: The Best Badminton YouTube Channels You Should Be Watching
frontmatter.description: The world watches plenty of YouTube every single day, good news as a Badminton fan there are now so many great Badminton channels to watch on YouTube.  Whether you want to watch live Badminton, learn to play Badminton and or just see some great montages there’s a channel for you. So which are the best Badminton YouTube channels?

frontmatter.title: Badminton Rules Made Simple for Beginners (PDF Included)
